from sys import stdin

T = int(stdin.readline().strip())
for x in xrange(T):
    N = int(stdin.readline().strip())
    A = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
    B = list(set(A))
    C = []
    D = []
    for i in B:
        C.append(A.count(i))
    b = max(C)
    for i in A:
        if A.count(i) == b:
            D.append(i)
    print min(D), b
